article_node.title: Rams QB Matthew Stafford to workout Saturday, per coach Sean McVay
article_node.summary: Los Angeles Rams quarterback Matthew Stafford is set to undergo a workout on Saturday to assess his aggravated back injury, which has kept him out of training camp. Head coach Sean McVay remains optimistic but emphasizes a cautious approach, noting that Stafford did not feel well enough to practice earlier this week despite a successful throwing session last Saturday. With the Rams' season opener approaching, the team is focused on ensuring Stafford's health while managing his practice time.
